name: One Tray Baked Caramelized Onion Pasta

ingredients.ingredient: Olive Oil or other cooking oil

instructions: Preheat oven to a suitable temperature for caramelizing onions (this will depend on your oven and the amount of onions,  approximately 375°F (190°C) is a good starting point).
Place onions in a single layer on a baking tray. Drizzle with oil, salt and pepper.
Bake onions in the preheated oven until caramelized (check periodically, time will depend on your oven and amount of onions).
Once onions are caramelized, remove from oven.
Squeeze garlic over the caramelized onions.
Add lemon juice to the onions.
Add your choice of greens to the baking tray.
